title: Fortnite debuts on Xbox Cloud Gaming completely free for Android users, no membership needed
content:
Cloud gaming has been a great way for everyone to discover and play new games with no downloads, though there is one problem. Not many free-to-play games come to cloud gaming in any capacity. Today, Xbox is looking to change that by bringing Fortnite to the cloud for free with no membership needed.

moreâ€¦

The post Fortnite debuts on Xbox Cloud Gaming completely free for Android users, no membership needed appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Fortnite has finally made its way to Xbox Cloud Gaming, and guess what. It's completely free to play on most devices.
